title: Larry David Played Bernie Sanders on SNL and It Was Fantastic
text: Larry David Played Bernie Sanders on SNL and It Was Fantastic Sunday, 18 October 2015 (16 minutes ago) Some people on Twitter think that Bernie Sanders acts a bit like Larry David as George Steinbrenner on 'Seinfeld'.
